function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven distribution of digital initiatives for health and education support","Impact":"Unequal access to health and education support, leading to increased risk of disease spread and educational disparities","Mitigation":"Implement equal distribution of digital initiatives in all areas to ensure equitable access to health and education support","Technologies":"Digital mapping and data analysis tools to identify areas in need of support","People":"Residents in areas with limited digital initiatives","Owner":"Municipal administrations"},{"Description":"Proximity between health support strategies and cities with better history of adopting digital tools","Impact":"Unequal access to health support, leading to increased risk of disease spread in areas with less digital support","Mitigation":"Promote digital literacy and provide resources to areas with limited digital tools to bridge the gap in access to health support","Technologies":"Online training and educational platforms to improve digital literacy","People":"Residents in areas with limited access to digital tools","Owner":"Municipal administrations"},{"Description":"High incidence of results in education support reflecting the need for alternative school arrangements","Impact":"Increased risk of educational disparities and lack of access to quality education in areas with limited digital support","Mitigation":"Invest in digital infrastructure and resources for education, provide equal access to online learning platforms","Technologies":"Digital learning platforms, virtual classrooms, and online educational resources","People":"Students in areas with limited access to digital education resources","Owner":"Municipal administrations"}]}
